alert.note: Alert for Cass; Richland (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 21 at 11:53AM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Sheyenne River at Harwood affecting Cass County. Sheyenne River near Kindred affecting Richland and Cass Counties. Sheyenne River Diversion at West Fargo affecting Cass County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sheyenne River near Kindred. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Rural flooding near gage begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 9.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday and continue rising to 17.5 feet Sunday. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
